review_blob:
12 oz bottle. Tastes like an amber but not as heavy and not as much caramel. Very balanced with good mouthfeel. 

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone
beer_name: Big Boss Sack Time Amber Rye

review_blob:
Bottle. Pours clear amber/red color with small amber/tan head. Aroma of citrus, hops, and a little caramel. Hops come through in the taste. Clean finish with just enough bitterness. Great beer by Ballast.

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone
beer_name: Ballast Point Homework Series Batch #1 - Hoppy Red Ale

review_blob:
Draft at 42 St Oyster Bar. Slight sour but not overpowering. Nice and refreshing for summer.
